name: validatinator
description: Simple, yet effective, vanilla JavaScript form validation plugin. Validatinator is based off of one of PHP's most famous framework, Laravel.  Using Validatinator is as easy as instantiating a Validatinator object, calling the passes or fails methods and if there are failed validations then grabbing those validations from the errors property on the main object.
author: David Jenkins <david.nicholas.jenkins@gmail.com>

scripts.docs: jsdoc -R README.md -r dev/js/ -d api_docs && cp api_docs/Validatinator.html api_docs/index.html
scripts.update-docs: git subtree push --prefix api_docs/ origin gh-pages
